name: Blucurrent Pte Ltd
overview:
Blucurrent was founded with the vision to be the leading mobile technology provider of the world. Blucurrentâ€™s main aim is to improve the efficiency with the increased and better use of mobile technology.

Blucurrent is currently embarking on developing two new mobile technology that is able to revolutionalize the use of mobile technology in payment and in the tourism sector â€“ LionXplorer & BluPay

LionXplorer - LionXplorer, aims to create a Bluetooth network in a retail mall that will allow retail owners to lower their marketing costs and empower shoppers with more information for free. Using Bluetooth and Touch Screen Technology, combined with Creative marketing media, we want to revolutionise the way people shop.

BluPay â€“ BluPay is developed as the state-of-the-art mobile payment gateway. Integrated as a secure payment solutions to retailers, BluPay allows mobile users to pay for their purchase using pre-paid credits via their mobile phones. The payment allows users to track their purchases, and rely less on their wallets in the future.
